name: FetchMarketplaceAvailableAddOn
description: Fetch an instance of an Add-on currently available to be installed.

Sid.description: The SID of the AvailableAddOn resource to fetch.

$ul: **configuration_schema**: The JSON object with the configuration that must be provided when installing a given Add-on.
**description**: A short description of the Add-on's functionality.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**pricing_type**: How customers are charged for using this Add-on.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the AvailableAddOn resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the resource.
